english.segment1: Let me be a shadow of Your light. Just a small reflection of a greater love. Let me be a shadow in Your light. That falls on the lost and the lonely
english.segment2: All that I am I lay at the cross. No sacrifice too great a cost. So down on my knees. Lord I ask You please
english.segment3: That falls on the lost and the lonely
english.segment4: Let me be a shadow in Your light
